m_q.target_metric: Pearson correlation coefficient between (1) annual difference in number of fires (NOAA minus NIFC) and (2) annual difference in acres burned (NOAA minus NIFC)
filters: Data must be available for same years in both sources
sub_questions: How to extract year from NOAA monthly Date column (format YYYYMM)?
How to parse NIFC data with inconsistent formatting?
How to handle missing or malformed values in NIFC data?

schema_conflicts: NOAA data is monthly, NIFC appears annual
NOAA Date format is YYYYMM integer, NIFC year format unclear
NIFC column names appear corrupted with tabs and numbers

scale_issues: NIFC data appears to use commas as thousands separators within numbers
NIFC column 3 (924) and column 4 (884) meaning unclear - possibly acres burned with formatting issues
cross_source_conflicts: NOAA reports monthly, NIFC appears annual - need annual aggregation for NOAA
NIFC data formatting inconsistent with commas and asterisks in values

format_notes: NOAA file has clean CSV format
NIFC file appears corrupted - first row suggests tab-separated values within columns
NIFC column names appear to be data values rather than proper headers
NIFC sample shows asterisk in 2004 data: *8,97,880

constraints: Correlation must be calculated on annual basis
Result must be to three decimal places
Only years with data in both sources can be used
derived_filters: Extract year from NOAA Date column (first 4 digits)
Clean NIFC data: remove commas, handle asterisks, parse tab-separated values
Aggregate NOAA monthly data to annual totals
output_format_requirements: Single correlation coefficient to three decimal places
Annual data table showing differences for verification
